channel.title: Carolina Yuste on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Carolina Yuste on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Locarno’s Spanish Previews: ‘Lóngquán,’ ‘Mantises,’ ‘Cowgirl’ Deliver a Breakout Performance, Fantasy Forest Beasts and Blushing Second Chance Rural Romance
item.description: “Lóngquán: The Dragon’s Spring,” a hybrid doc-fiction feature marking the feature debut of Catalan Adrià Guxens, walked off with the work-in-progress award at Locarno Pro’s inaugural Spanish Previews.
